author: jacopoc
msg: Some optimization for service event handler to prevent unnecessary operations at every service invocation.

author: remm
msg: BZ56840: Tomcat gets the context path from the URI (rather than from the mapping data, which is another possible source) so it is not possible to reset it before getting it.

author: kkolinko
msg: Revert public API changes from r1615876
I think match(String, char[], boolean) is a bad signature to expose such method as public.
a) Maybe there is a way to cache String->char[] conversions for the pattern set as well.
In that case the method signature will become (char[],char[],..).
As of now the current improvement is an incomplete one.
b) I am not sure that using String vs char[] array has much difference.
Is it worth to stick to char[] in the API?

author: markt
msg: Updated expected value that has changed in 1617445
